Layout areaStacked

draws a area chart layout

Usage

< area-stacked [area-stacked=""] ... >
  ...
</>
Required DimensionsDimension Attribute Defaults
x
type = linear
domainRange = extent
y
type = linear
domainRange = total
color
type = category20

Arguments

Param Type Description
areaStacked
(optional, default: zero)
 expression
